opener.dateline:
431 Stevens st.Street
cor West.
Camden, N.New Jersey. JanJanuaryJan 15.

body.p: Glad to get your letter, this morning. Am about as at last writing—every thing more favorable than unfavorable. John Burroughs is here on a visit. Cold & clear here, snow & sleighing—I am going out a little—
